name: Shaun the Sheep - Puzzle Putt
description:
From the creators of Shear Speed and Home Sheep Home, Aardman Animations presents Shaun the Sheep’s latest puzzle game ‘Puzzle Putt’!

Shaun’s off to play a relaxing round of mini golf, but there’s a problem... the course is littered with obstacles and it looks like those unruly pigs have been digging up the greens! Help Shaun crack the course by solving fiendish puzzles and building creative constructions to beat the holes. Can you complete all 8 courses and finish under par? It’s Shaun’s toughest challenges yet - it’ll call for a steady hand and a quick mind.

• Think, Build, Putt, and Swing your way to farmyard domination.
• Wallop your way through 72 levels across 8 courses.
• Invent your own route using a crazy assortment of building blocks and power-ups.
• Build your own fantasy crazy golf course in Creative mode.
• Make your friends cower at your fiendishly cunning courses and exceptional high scores…
• … and make the world gasp at your most epic shots.
